column5: We are in the middle of it all. Tanger Outlet Mall in San Marcos. Movie theater and great restaurants in nearby New Braunfels. Walk around Wimberley experience art & Wine tasting. Less than an hour to Austin and 40 mins to San Antonio see the Alamo and famous River Walk. Canyon Lake access is just 6 miles down the road! Walk on top of the Dam a few miles from this house. Take everyone to the Guadalupe River & tube all day long, 1 mile from the entrance of our neighborhood!
